title: I GOT A BAN FOR BEING AFK WHEN I WASNT?
body: I was playing Ekko in a normal 5v5 match and i got a ban for being afk when i wasn't..... HOW?

replies.body:
Were you disconnected at any point during the match?

Sounds to me like you closed your game or left at some point for a period of time longer than X required to be flagged for afk, do you do this often?

You were more then likely chilling at fountain moving around thinking leave buster won't get me if im moving. Well, it does haha. You have to be actively csing or hitting enemies to get un-leave busted.

I was using in mid as 
ekko
